channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Older Versions of Webex Desktop App Going End-of-Life May 30
item.description: DotCIO’s Multimedia Services would like to make the Rensselaer community aware that version 43.7 and earlier of the Webex Desktop App will reach end of life on Thursday, May 30. File a support request with the Help Desk if you need help making sure the app is fully up-to-date!
item.author: Community

item.title: From Multimedia Services: New MyMediasite Video Editor Now Available
item.description: Multimedia Services would like to inform the Rensselaer community that the MyMediasite multimedia video system now has a new video editor with increased functionality that is immediately available to everyone with access to MyMediaite for recorded and uploaded videos. Please see the ITSSC article, “Editing Video in MyMediasite,” for more information.
item.author: Community

item.title: Cuthand to Lead “Be the Media!” Participatory Radio Workshop
item.description: Date: Thursday, May 30, 2024 5:00 PM - 9:00 PM - In a second event co-presented by iEAR Presents and the EMPAC curatorial program, Theo Jean Cuthand will lead a participatory radio workshop at The Sanctuary for Independent Media in Troy, to be followed by a talk and screening with an emphasis on his methods of film and game production and a particular focus on Indigiqueer and ecological issues. Please register to attend!
item.author: Community

item.title: “Center of Gravity” Events Continue May 29
item.description: Date: Wednesday, May 29, 2024 4:00 PM - 10:00 PM - The Center of Gravity is your one-stop for personal, academic and well-being success this summer! Activities include novelty food and snacks, academic support from peer tutors and course TAs, away semester searches with the CCPD, wellness and well-being activities, water coloring, Legos, book clubs and more, so be sure to visit weekly!
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI Sweeps 2023-24 Liberty League Men’s Tennis Awards
item.description: Aiden Drover-Mattinen and Tsubi Okada of the Rensselaer men’s tennis team were named the respective Liberty League Player of the Year and Rookie of the Year, as voted on by the conference’s head coaches. In addition, Head Coach Jon Satkowski and Assistant Coach Stephane Legris earned the league’s Coaching Staff of the Year award.
item.author: Community

item.title: Mueller Center Schedules Summer Fitness Classes
item.description: Date: Thursday, May 23, 2024 8:00 AM - Fri , July 26, 2024 12:00 AM - Registration is now open for summer fitness classes, which will take place weekdays from noon to 1pm in the Mueller Center. Classes are $40 for the entire summer, ending Friday, August 9. If you have questions, please contact Donna Sutton.
item.author: Community

item.title: Virtual Housing Fair to be Held June 5
item.description: Date: Wednesday, June 5, 2024 9:00 AM - 10:30 AM - The Off-Campus Commons is pleased to host this virtual housing fair to give students a chance to learn more about off-campus housing, meet the RPI staff who can assist, and interact with several property owners who cater to RPI students. Feel free to join the Discord Server any time during the event….
item.author: Students

item.title: HelioCampus Training, Resources to Aid Instructors in Reviewing Spring Course Results
item.description: Spring 2024 student course evaluation results will be available to instructors on May 28, 2024; on May 30 and June 10, the Office of Undergraduate Education will offer live webinar training for instructors and TAs on running those results. Those who cannot attend a live session or prefer to review on their own may refer to the HelioCampus Resource Site.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: TIAA Offering Confidential In-Person Reitement Counseling June 12
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, June 12, 2024 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
